Translations.Text: Ye ke'u ihakala kamana kare, ami sesaba lokake ya iccha sattbara diye de'i. Atahpara tadera jan'ye jahannama nirdharana kari. Ora tate nindita-bitarita abasthaya prabesa karabe.
Ara yara parakala kamana kare ebam mumina abasthaya tara jan'ya yathayatha cesta-sadhana kare, emana lokadera cesta sbikrta haye thake.
Ederake ebam oderake pratyekake ami apanara palanakartara dana pauche de'i ebam apanara palakartara dana abadharita.
Dekhuna, ami tadera ekadalake aparera upara kibhabe sresthatba dana karalama. Parakala to niscaya'i martabaya srestha ebam phayilate sresthatama.
Sthira karo na allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya. Tahale tumi nindita o asahaya haye parabe.

Tomara palanakarta adesa karechena ye, tamke chara an'ya kara'o ebadata karo na ebam pita-matara sathe sadba-byabahara kara. Tadera madhye ke'u athaba ubhaye'i yadi tomara jibaddasaya bardhakye upanita haya; tabe taderake â€˜uhaâ€™ sabdati'o balo na ebam taderake dhamaka di'o na ebam bala taderake sisthacarapurna katha.
Tadera samane bhalabasara sathe, namrabhabe matha nata kare da'o ebam balah he palanakarta, tadera ubhayera prati rahama kara, yemana tara amake saisabakale lalana-palana karechena.
Tomadera palanakarta tomadera mane ya ache ta bhala'i janena. Yadi tomara sat ha'o, tabe tini ta'obakaridera jan'ye ksamasila.
Atniya-sbajanake tara haka dana kara ebam abhabagrasta o musaphirake'o. Ebam kichute'i apabyaya karo na.
Niscaya apabyayakarira sayatanera bha'i. Sayatana sbiya palanakartara prati atisaya akrtajna.
